You can also specify a default layout for all your pages using the Router component.
Master Pages can define multiple content placeholders, but layouts in Blazor only have a property. This limitation of Blazor layout components will hopefully be addressed in a future

Master Pages in ASP.NET Web Forms can be nested. That is, a Master Page may also use a Page. Layout components in Blazor may be nested too. You can apply a layout component to component. The contents of the inner layout will be rendered within the outer layout.
